sub_topic: Calculating the boiling and melting points of inorganic compounds
message_1: What is the boiling point of iron (III) oxide (Fe2O3) in Kelvin scale if its melting point is 1,565 degrees Celsius? Assume that Fe2O3 has a standard molar entropy of 89.9 J/mol K.
